ingredients: 2 cups diced honeydew melon, 1  English (seedless) cucumber, peeled and diced, 1 small onion, diced, 1  avocado - peeled, pitted, and chopped, 1  jalapeno pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped, 1 clove garlic, chopped,   +   1/4 cup white balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon lime juice,   salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Sodium 47mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 10g 37%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 56mg 281%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 980mg 21%
